name: Layover Lovers
description:
Synopsis

Dan and Lucia are almost the complete opposite of one another from opposite sides of the world. When they've both decided to turn their worlds upside down, they encounter at the halfway point. A brief time together that makes a huge, lasting impact in their lives.

Background

This is a free short visual (kinetic) novel. The story is told from the point of view of each character, chosen by the player. Originally a NaNoRenO 2019 project, the assets have been revamped for an official release.
